properties.author: Oddvar Moe, Sander Wiebing, oscd.community
properties.description: Detects the import of the specified file to the registry with regedit.exe.
properties.displayName: Imports Registry Key From a File
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ((ProcessCommandLine contains " /i " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /s " or ProcessCommandLine contains ".reg") and (FolderPath endswith "\\regedit.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "REGEDIT.EXE")) and (not(((ProcessCommandLine contains " -e " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /e " or ProcessCommandLine contains " -a " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /a " or ProcessCommandLine contains " -c " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /c ") and ProcessCommandLine matches regex ":[^ \\\\]")))
